title: You Sound Sleepy - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   College/University   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Mangaka   Protagonist Falls in Love First
author: 瓷话
description:
Every lecture by Professor Que Qingyan was full of people and not a seat was spare.

The students in the audience crowded all the way up to the door and into the corridor outside.

But Lin Mian could magically always be found in the first three rows every time.

And there…

…she would sleep right in front of him.>
